data.description: This document will guide you through the quick start process to help you get started with our W3IPFS service. Let's dive in!

leaves.text: Welcome to AIOZ W3IPFS Infrastructure, the revolutionary one-stop shop for all your NFT (Non-Fungible Token) storage, and pinning needs. Our platform combines the power of AIOZ Network and IPFS to provide a comprehensive solution for managing your valuable digital assets.

AIOZ W3IPFS Infrastructure offers a cutting-edge infrastructure that ensures the integrity, accessibility, and long-term preservation of your NFTs. Whether you are an artist, collector, or developer, our service is designed to simplify the complex process of managing NFT files and data.

With AIOZ W3IPFS, you can easily create an account, upload files, and interact with our service through a user-friendly website or programmatically via our powerful SDK API. Whether you need to store individual NFT files or entire directories, our platform ensures secure and efficient storage.
Follow the step-by-step instructions below to quickly set up and start using the AIOZ W3IPFS service.
Step 1: Creating an AIOZ W3IPFS Account
To begin, you need to create an AIOZ W3IPFS account. Visit the
and follow the provided instructions to set up your account.

Navigate to the "Billing" tab. Click on the "Top Up" button. This action will trigger a pop-up window for the top-up process. In the pop-up window, select the estimated monthly storage and monthly delivery bandwidth that you require.

option. A payment address and QR code will be displayed. Take note of the address or scan the QR code using your wallet application. Use your wallet to send the desired amount of AIOZ tokens to the provided address. Wait for a few minutes while the transaction is confirmed.
Once the transaction is confirmed, the status of the transaction will be displayed in your account. You will be able to see the details of the transaction, including the transaction ID.
Step 3: Uploading a File via the Website
Once you have an account, you can easily
. From there, you can select the file you want to upload and initiate the upload process.
Click on the "+" button located in the top right corner of the website interface. Select "Upload file".

To upload files, drag and drop the files you want to upload from your computer directly into the website. Alternatively, click on the file selection area to browse your computer and select the files you wish to upload. Click on the "Upload" button to initiate the upload process
Step 4: Getting a Free API Key

W3IPFS offers developer keys for various scenarios. The most common scenario is normal IPFS actions (pinning content, unpinning, listing content, etc). You can access and create your W3IPFS API keys here:
Enter a key name for your API Key and click
field somewhere secure where you know you won't lose it. You can click
to copy your new API token to your clipboard.
Step 5: Uploading Files & Directories via the W3IPFS SDK API
Create a new project by making a new directory and initializing a new project using npm. Open your terminal and run the following commands:
and open it with your code editor. Use the
method to pin the file to IPFS, passing in the readable stream for the file and the options object
To pin a folder, use the
method, providing the path to the folder as a string. In this example, we're pinning a folder named
To pin NFT using the AIOZ W3IPFS service
file represents the metadata for the NFT. Here's a breakdown of the fields:
"description": "This is an NFT that represents my creativity as a digital artist!",
: A description that provides information about the NFT.
: An array of properties or traits associated with the NFT.
file according to your specific NFT metadata requirements. You can add or remove fields and customize the values to accurately represent your NFT.
By running this code, you can utilize the

package to interact with the AIOZ W3IPFS service and pin files and folders to IPFS. Customize the code according to your specific requirements, including providing the appropriate API key and secret key, specifying the file/folder paths, and adjusting the options and metadata fields as needed.

Understanding Gateways and their Importance in IPFS
pages.description: This article aims to explain the purpose of gateways, why they are needed, and how they facilitate the retrieval of content from IPFS.

pages.title: The W3IPFS Public Gateway
pages.description: This documentation provides an overview of the W3IPFS public gateway, a publicly accessible node that serves content pinned on the IPFS

pages.title: Dedicated Gateways
pages.description: This documentation provides a guide to dedicated gateways for the W3IPFS pinning service. Dedicated gateways offer faster speeds and increased rate limits for retrieving content stored on the IPFS

pages.title: FAQ
pages.description: Our aim is to provide you with a delightful experience. Here are some frequently asked questions to help you better understand w3ipfs Pinning Service:
